The user uses a giant [[Binding Cloth|roll of cloth]] to tightly wrap up the intended opponent, completely immobilising them, thus preventing them from moving or using any techniques. The ability itself is versatile as once completed, the addition of further [[Sealing Tag|seals]] can be placed on top of the bound victims, preventing them from even being summoned while in effect. This technique is used by [[Sunagakure]] ninja. Mere physical contact with the cloth seems to be required to use this technique.
